messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Maconha Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on Bioscans, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
